证据片段: the oxygen self-diffusion coefficients were measured. Specimens from the four experimental materials, oxidized for variable times between 1 and 100 days, were given a second oxidation treatment in water vapor enriched in O¹⁸.

证据片段: The second type of test used water enriched with 10% H₂O¹⁸ in an autoclave under a pressure of 9.8 MPa (i.e., close to the conventional value of 10.3 MPa).

证据片段: The X-ray diffraction and Raman spectroscopy measurements show that the thermal oxide scales formed at 400°C contain two phases, the monoclinic structure being accompanied by considerable amounts of the tetragonal form (40% near the metal/oxide interface).
